the remaining trouble spots in algol 60 this paper lists the ambiguities remaining language which have been noticed since publication of revised report 1963 cacm october 1967 knuth d e ca671002 jb february 27 1978 2 40 pm 1530 4 1531 1565 1703 1945 2036 2707 2753 1185 5 1455 1781 123 6 196 919 990 1007 1046 1131 1139 1140 1149 1198 1215 1223 1265 1303 1323 1358 1366 1421 1460 1462 1463 1467 1468 1477 1491 1496 1535 1601 1602 1613 1614 1626 1641 1787 1788 205 224 249 288 316 381 398 11 404 410 463 464 483 3184 3188 584 600 680 691 763 799
